channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Blowfish Malibu Footwear
channel.desc: Discover a varied range of sandals, wedges and trainers with a laid-back aesthetic. Blowfish gives us a Malibu-inspired story with eco-friendly product at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion Deals
channel.desc: Elevate your style with Ruth Langsford's chic fashion collection. From classic jeans to vibrant prints, find the perfect pieces to boost your fashion confidence.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Kim & Co
channel.desc: From chic daywear to evening sophistication and weekend comfort to party glamour, discover the Kim & Co collection - designed for every occasion.
